responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Open Redirect in Gallery View
    analysis: |
      The `perception_sort` parameter in the Gallery View (web/assets/templates/gallery.html) appears to be vulnerable to an open redirect attack.
      The parameter is reflected in the pagination links without proper validation or sanitization.
      An attacker could potentially craft a malicious URL with a crafted `perception_sort` parameter that redirects the user to an external malicious website.
    cwe: CWE-601
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - web/assets/templates/gallery.html
    classification: slightly promising
```

leads.headline: Open Redirect in Gallery View
leads.analysis:
The perception_sort parameter in the Gallery View (web/assets/templates/gallery.html) appears to be vulnerable to an open redirect attack.
The parameter is reflected in the pagination links without proper validation or sanitization.
An attacker could potentially craft a malicious URL with a crafted perception_sort parameter that redirects the user to an external malicious website.
